name: Memory Collectors
description:
Navigate a broken-down space station in search of some of the last mementos left behind by human beings before a black hole swallows them whole.

Created by Luis León for the Global Game Jam 2021 which topic was "Lost & Found".

Diversifiers:

Starlight: Your game world is inspired by stars and constellations.

On the safe side: Make a game alone or in a team where all members are at least 100km apart.

Update 1.02.

- Bug fixes.

Warning for Mac users:

Download from the Itch.io app or it probably won't run.
